channel.title: Network | Women in Mining South Africa
channel.copyright: Solid Gold Studios - all rights reserved
channel.description:
WiMSA creates an empowering network to inspire, support, and develop the progression of women working in the South African mining industry.

To become a member or supporter, visit wimsa.org.za

Make a donation to WiMSA
channel.itunes:subtitle: Empowering Women in the South African Mining Industry
channel.itunes:author: WiMSA | Solid Gold Studios
channel.itunes:summary: WiMSA creates an empowering network to inspire, support, and develop the progression of women working in the South African mining industry.

item.author: wimsa@solidgoldstudios.co.za (WiMSA Network | Solid Gold Studios)
item.itunes:author: WiMSA Women in Mining South Africa | Solid Gold Studios
item.title: WiMSA Events 2019 | Danielle Bearman
item.itunes:title: WiMSA Events 2019 | Danielle Bearman
item.itunes:subtitle: Danielle Bearman, our events coordinator, gives us a preview of the WiMSA events coming up in 2019
item.description:
In this episode we hear from WiMSA events coordinator about all of the exciting events WiMSA is planning for 2019. WiMSA hosts a number of networking, mentoring, youth and regional events each year.

To become a member or supporter, visit wimsa.org.za

Make a donation to WiMSA
item.itunes:summary: In this episode we hear from WiMSA events coordinator about all of the exciting events WiMSA is planning for 2019. WiMSA hosts a number of networking, mentoring, youth and regional events each year.

item.author: wimsa@solidgoldstudios.co.za (WiMSA Network | Solid Gold Studios)
item.itunes:author: WiMSA Women in Mining South Africa | Solid Gold Studios
item.title: Meet the WiMSA Committee | Lindi Nakedi, Thabile Makgala, Briony Liber, Petro du Pisani, Yomeshka Moodley, Tendani Lukhaimane, Nonkuleleko Hope Dire, Nomfundo Simelane
item.itunes:title: Meet the WiMSA Committee | Lindi Nakedi, Thabile Makgala, Briony Liber, Petro du Pisani, Yomeshka Moodley, Tendani Lukhaimane, Nonkuleleko Hope Dire, Nomfundo Simelane
item.itunes:subtitle: Hear what the WiMSA committee members are planning for 2019 - and how YOU can get involved.
item.description:
The WiMSA Chair, Thabile Makgala, introduces the 2019 committee and their portfolios and discusses their objectives and specific requests on how members can get involved.

To become a member or supporter, visit wimsa.org.za

Make a donation to WiMSA
item.itunes:summary: The WiMSA Chair, Thabile Makgala, introduces the 2019 committee and their portfolios and discusses their objectives and specific requests on how members can get involved.
item.itunes:keywords: Committee, Engagement, Empower women, Women in Mining, South African mining industry, thought leadership

item.author: wimsa@solidgoldstudios.co.za (WiMSA Network | Solid Gold Studios)
item.itunes:author: WiMSA Women in Mining South Africa | Solid Gold Studios
item.title: Meet the chairs! | Lindi Nakedi and Thabile Makgala
item.itunes:title: Meet the chairs! | Lindi Nakedi and Thabile Makgala
item.itunes:subtitle: Talking to our outgoing and incoming chairpersons
item.description:
WiMSA deputy chairperson, Petro du Pisani, talks to our outgoing chairperson, Lindi Nakedi, about WiMSA's accomplishments over the past two years. Incoming chairperson Thabile Makgala gives us a glimpse into what lies ahead for WiMSA over the next couple of years.

To become a member or supporter, visit wimsa.org.za

Make a donation to WiMSA
item.itunes:summary: WiMSA deputy chairperson, Petro du Pisani, talks to our outgoing chairperson, Lindi Nakedi, about WiMSA's accomplishments over the past two years. Incoming chairperson Thabile Makgala gives us a glimpse into what lies ahead for WiMSA over the next couple of years.
item.itunes:keywords: WiMSA achievements, WiMSA strategy, WiMSA chairperson
